div.p: READING THE BOOK. WELL, THAT IS AN INTERESTING
REACTION, THANK YOU FOR READING IT.
AND FINALLY THE TIP OF THE DAY, WHAT I GAVE UP FOR LENT.
CHRISTIANS BELIEVE IN GIVING UP, THE DAY BEFORE EASTER SUNDAY.
AND IN WESTBURY, LONG ISLAND, THEY DRUMMED THAT INTO OUR
HEADS. WE, 60 URCHINS IN THE CLASS HAD
TO GIVE UP STUFF DURING LENT OR ELSE.
AND THESE WOMEN KNEW IF YOU WERE FUDGING IT.
THEY SOMEHOW HAD THIS RADAR, NOW.
THAT STAYED WITH ME ALL OF THESE YEARS.
SO THIS LENT I HAVE GIVEN UP SUGAR SNACKS.
THAT MEANS NO ICE CREAM. AND I LIKE ICE CREAM.
NO COOKIES. NO CAKE, NOTHING THAT IS SWEET.
BELIEVE ME, THIS IS NOT EASY. BUT IF JESUS COULD BE IN THE
DESERT AND NOT EAT ANYTHING FOR 40 DAYS EXCEPT BUGS AND HONEY I
CAN DO THIS. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
SACRIFICE CAN BE A GOOD THING. THAT IS IT FOR US.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FACTOR WEBSITE, DIFFERENT FROM Oâ€™REILLY
